article.headline: Southern University 62, Louisiana Tech 47
article.story: BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) -- Douglas Scott scored 17 points and grabbed seven rebounds to lead Southern University to a 62-47 win over Louisiana Tech on Saturday. Scott shot 7-of-13 from the floor and 3-of-4 from the free throw line. Steffon Wiley added 10 points while Geri Guillory pulled in eight rebounds for Southern (1-10). Tech (2-7) was led by Trey McDowell who scored 12 points and pulled in six rebounds. Chad McKenzie added 10 points. Southern held a 31-21 halftime lead shooting 37 percent from the floor. For the game, the Jaguars shot 37 percent. Tech shot 31 percent for the game, hitting 4-of-13 from the 3-point range. The Bulldogs outrebounded Southern 48-38.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
